item.title: 对俄罗斯资产的热捧掩盖了部分投资者对 "永久冻土 "的担忧
item.description: 大型基金经理预计，尽管有大量 "奇特 "交易押注莫斯科和华盛顿之间的关系缓和，但俄罗斯的大部分资产仍将不对西方投资者开放。【原文：Large fund managers expect the bulk of Russia's assets to remain closed to Western investors, despite a flurry of "exotic" trades betting on a rapprochement between Moscow and Washington.】

item.title: 英国 Argo 区块链公司任命 Justin Nolan 为首席执行官
item.description: 英国加密货币矿商阿尔戈区块链公司（Argo Blockchain）周一任命贾斯汀-诺兰（Justin Nolan）为首席执行官。【原文：British cryptocurrency miner Argo Blockchain on Monday named Justin Nolan as its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 印尼达纳塔拉主权基金任命前总统、萨克斯、达利奥和前泰国总理他信组成 "梦之队
item.description: 新成立的印尼达纳塔拉主权基金（Danantara Indonesia）周一公布了其制定战略的 "梦之队"，其中包括对冲基金经理雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）、经济学家杰弗里-萨克斯（Jeffrey Sachs）和具有影响力的泰国前总理他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）等前总统和顾问。【原文：New sovereign fund Danantara Indonesia on Monday unveiled its "dream team" to chart its strategy, which included ex-presidents and advisory roles for hedge fund manager Ray Dalio, economist Jeffrey Sachs and influential former Thai premier Thaksin Shinawatra.】

item.title: 苹果公司宣布在中国设立 9,900 万美元的新清洁能源基金
item.description: 苹果公司周一表示，将在中国设立一个新的清洁能源基金，该基金价值 7.2 亿元人民币（合 9922 万美元），正值苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）访问北京之际。【原文：Apple Inc said on Monday it will set up a new clean energy fund in China worth 720 million yuan ($99.22 million), coinciding with a Beijing visit of its CEO Tim Cook.】

item.title: 新日铁总裁称仍在与华盛顿进行美国钢铁收购谈判
item.description: 新日铁总裁今井忠志（Tadashi Imai）周一表示，新日铁与美国政府就收购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）计划的谈判仍在进行中。【原文：Nippon Steel's negotiations with the U.S. government regarding its planned acquisition of U.S. Steel are still ongoing, President Tadashi Imai said on Monday.】

item.title: Klarna 提交 IPO 申请激发英国金融科技公司上市的希望
item.description: 投资者、律师和一位高管告诉路透社，Klarna 即将在美国进行首次公开募股，这将有助于在新技术上市荒芜期过后，为英国金融科技公司的上市铺平道路。【原文：Klarna's upcoming U.S. initial public offering could help unlock a pipeline of British fintech flotations after a barren period for new technology listings, investors, lawyers and an executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国股票发行量翻番，科技竞赛吸引全球投资者回归
item.description: 全球投资者在观望了两年之后，越来越多地重新评估中国大陆股市，银行家们表示，这将有助于推动中国股市重新活跃起来，1-3 月份的股票发行量比去年同期翻了一番。【原文：Global investors are increasingly re-rating mainland China's stock markets after two years of sitting on the sidelines, which bankers said will help drive renewed activity in a market where equity issuance doubled in January-March versus a year earlier.】

item.title: 欧洲在关税退让的暗示之后心情大好
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 澳大利亚成为矿业上市的首选目的地
item.description: 行业消息人士称，受澳大利亚养老金财富、监管以及受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易战影响较小的司法管辖区的吸引，今年澳大利亚证券交易所将迎来创纪录数量的矿业开发商二次上市。【原文：Australia's bourse is set for a record number of secondary listings this year from mine developers enticed by the country's pension wealth, regulation and a jurisdiction less exposed to U.S President Donald Trump's trade wars, industry sources said.】

item.title: DNA 检测公司 23andMe 申请破产保护以出售自己
item.description: 基因检测公司 23andMe 周日在美国申请破产保护，并表示正在寻求出售自己。【原文：Genetic testing firm 23andMe filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the U.S. on Sunday and said it was looking to sell itself.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：迫于美国压力，马来西亚将收紧半导体法规
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，马来西亚计划加强对半导体的监管，因为它受到了美国的压力，要求阻止对人工智能发展至关重要的芯片流向中国。【原文：Malaysia plans to tighten regulations on semiconductors as it comes under U.S. pressure to staunch the flow to China of chips crucial to the development of artificial intelligence, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 市场正驶向关税风暴，期货坚挺，美元漂移
item.description: 周一，金融市场开局好坏参半，美国股票期货上涨，但美元在数据、中国财报和美国即将大幅提高关税的威胁推动下摇摆不定。【原文：Financial markets made an mixed start on Monday with U.S. stock futures rising but the dollar wavering ahead of a week driven by data, Chinese earnings and the threat of steep U.S. tariff hikes on the horizon.】

item.title: 交易员等待特朗普关税明朗化，美元震荡下行
item.description: 周一，美元兑主要货币汇率略低于三周高点，交易商谨慎地等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下一轮关税政策的明朗化。【原文：The dollar drifted just below a three-week high versus major peers on Monday as traders cautiously awaited clarity on U.S. President Donald Trump's next round of tariffs.】

item.title: 投资者关注俄乌停火谈判，油价保持稳定
item.description: 油价周一持稳，因为投资者对旨在结束俄乌战争的停火谈判前景进行了评估，停火谈判可能导致俄罗斯石油进入全球市场的数量增加。【原文：Oil prices held steady on Monday as investors assessed the outlook for ceasefire talks aimed at ending the Russia-Ukraine war, which could lead to an increase in Russian oil to global markets.】

item.title: 中国副总理向苹果、辉瑞、嘉吉等公司保证商业潜力
item.description: 中国国务院副总理何立峰周日会见了苹果公司、辉瑞公司、万事达卡公司、嘉吉公司和其他公司的负责人，试图向外国企业负责人保证中国的商业潜力。【原文：China's Vice Premier He Lifeng sought to reassure foreign corporate chiefs of the country's business potential when he met with the heads of Apple , Pfizer , Mastercard , Cargill and others on Sunday.】

item.title: 日本央行的信息：即使特朗普关税引发风险，食品通胀也不容忽视
item.description: 日本央行上周召开的会议没有带来任何惊喜，但对于细心的日本央行观察者来说，会议传达的关于需要对食品驱动的通胀压力保持警惕的信息有一个重要的启示：加息的时间可能比预期的要早。【原文：The Bank of Japan's meeting last week passed with no surprises, but for a careful BOJ watcher its message on the need to remain vigilant on food-driven inflationary pressures had an important takeaway: Rates could be raised sooner than expected.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称 Rapid7 接近与激进分子 Jana Partners 达成和解
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社，在网络安全公司与对冲基金讨论如何通过改善运营和探索出售来提振股价之后，Rapid7 接近与激进投资者 Jana Partners 达成和解。【原文：Rapid7 is nearing a settlement with activist investor Jana Partners after the cybersecurity company and the hedge fund discussed ways to boost the share price by improving operations and exploring a sale, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 伊拉克计划到 2029 年将石油产能提高到每日 600 万桶以上
item.description: 据伊拉克国家通讯社报道，伊拉克石油部周日表示，伊拉克计划到2029年将石油日产量提高到600万桶以上。【原文：Iraq plans to raise oil production capacity to more than 6 million barrels per day (bpd) by 2029, the state news agency reported Iraq's oil ministry as saying on Sunday.】

item.title: 伊拉克计划到 2029 年将石油产能提高到每日 600 万桶以上
item.description: 据伊拉克国家通讯社报道，伊拉克石油部周日表示，伊拉克计划到2029年将石油日产量提高到600万桶以上。【原文：Iraq plans to raise oil production capacity to more than 6 million barrels per day (bpd) by 2029, the state news agency reported Iraq's oil ministry as saying on Sunday.】

item.title: 洞察力：特朗普冻结监管令美国渔业陷入混乱
item.description:
美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的监管冻结措施给一些利润丰厚的美国渔场带来了混乱和不确定性，增加了东海岸一些鳕鱼和黑线鳕船队捕捞季节推迟开始的风险，也增加了美国渔民的风险。
根据路透社对行业组织和联邦政府雇员的采访，这一举措导致了大西洋蓝鳍金枪鱼的过度捕捞。【原文：President Donald Trump’s regulatory freeze has injected chaos and uncertainty into a number of lucrative American fisheries, raising the risk of a delayed start to the fishing season for some East Coast cod and haddock fleets and
leading to overfishing of Atlantic bluefin tuna, according to Reuters interviews with industry groups and federal government employees.】

item.title: 洞察力：特朗普冻结监管令美国渔业陷入混乱
item.description:
美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的监管冻结措施给一些利润丰厚的美国渔场带来了混乱和不确定性，增加了东海岸一些鳕鱼和黑线鳕船队捕捞季节推迟开始的风险，也增加了美国渔民的风险。
根据路透社对行业组织和联邦政府雇员的采访，这一举措导致了大西洋蓝鳍金枪鱼的过度捕捞。【原文：President Donald Trump’s regulatory freeze has injected chaos and uncertainty into a number of lucrative American fisheries, raising the risk of a delayed start to the fishing season for some East Coast cod and haddock fleets and
leading to overfishing of Atlantic bluefin tuna, according to Reuters interviews with industry groups and federal government employees.】

item.title: 瑞士部长强调美国为避免特朗普征收关税做出的贡献
item.description: 瑞士经济事务部长居伊-帕梅林（Guy Parmelin）表示，瑞士在寻求避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税的过程中，强调了瑞士对美国经济的贡献。【原文：Switzerland has highlighted the country's contribution to the U.S. economy as it seeks to avoid tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, Swiss economic affairs minister Guy Parmelin said.】

item.title: 中国总理在重要商业论坛上警告 "不稳定性加剧
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强周日在北京举行的一个商业论坛上敦促各国开放市场，以应对 "日益加剧的不稳定性和不确定性"。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang urged countries to open up their markets to combat "rising instability and uncertainty" at a business forum in Beijing on Sunday, as China braces for further U.S. tariff headwinds.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局飞行员安全信息发布系统中断后恢复运行
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）和航空公司表示，美国联邦航空管理局向飞行员提供安全信息的一个系统在周六经历了几个小时的故障，然后才恢复运行。【原文：A U.S. Federal Aviation Administration system that provides safety messages to pilots experienced an outage for several hours on Saturday before resuming operations, the agency and airlines said.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI、Meta 正在与 Reliance 商谈人工智能合作事宜
item.description: 据科技新闻网站 The Information 周六报道，OpenAI 和 Meta Platforms 已分别与印度信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）就潜在的合作关系进行了讨论，以扩大其在印度的人工智能产品。【原文：OpenAI and Meta Platforms have held separate discussions with India's Reliance Industries over potential partnerships to expand their artificial intelligence offerings in the country, technology news website The Information reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 独家报道一些欧洲官员权衡特朗普执政后能否依赖美联储提供美元
item.description: 六位熟悉内情的人士说，一些欧洲央行和监管官员正在质疑，在市场面临压力时，他们是否还能依靠美国联邦储备局提供美元资金，这让人们对一直以来金融稳定的基石产生了一些怀疑。【原文：Some European central banking and supervisory officials are questioning whether they can still rely on the U.S. Federal Reserve to provide dollar funding in times of market stress, six people familiar with the matter said, casting some doubt over what has been a bedrock of financial stability.】

item.title: 国防部长称意大利与星链公司的交易陷入僵局
item.description: 意大利国防部长周六表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下卫星互联网运营商星链公司（Starlink）与意大利政府之间的潜在合同谈判已陷入僵局，这反映出更广泛的地缘政治紧张局势。【原文：Negotiations on a potential contract between Elon Musk's satellite internet operator Starlink and the Italian government have stalled, reflecting broader geopolitical tensions, Italy's defence minister said on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国人工智能竞争日趋激烈，腾讯推出 T1 推理模型
item.description: 中国科技巨头腾讯公司周五晚推出了其 T1 推理模型的正式版本，加剧了中国日益拥挤的人工智能领域的竞争。【原文：Chinese tech giant Tencent on Friday night launched the official version of its T1 reasoning model, stepping up competition in China's increasingly crowded artificial intelligence sector.】

item.title: 卡尼表示，加拿大的目标是实现可抵消美国关税的内部自由贸易
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周五表示，加拿大可以通过消除国内贸易壁垒来抵消美国关税的影响，他的目标是在与各省和地区领导人会晤后，在7月1日前实现国内自由贸易。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney on Friday said Canada could offset the effects of any U.S. tariffs by removing internal trade barriers and that he aimed for free trade within the country by July 1, after meeting provincial and territorial leaders.】

item.title: 科蒂公司向SKIMS出售金-卡戴珊美容品牌股份
item.description: CoverGirl 的母公司科蒂公司（Coty）周五表示，将把真人秀明星金-卡戴珊（Kim Kardashian）美容品牌 20% 的股份出售给她的服装品牌 SKIMS，将这两项业务合并为一个品牌。【原文：CoverGirl parent Coty said on Friday it would sell its 20% stake in reality TV star Kim Kardashian's beauty brand to her clothing line, SKIMS, consolidating the two businesses under a single brand.】
